Are you attempting to use database sessions?
Thanks. I'll try and reproduce this issue.

issue.title: 2.x Build and Pass with PHP7.2

repository.name: cakephp
repository.description: CakePHP: The Rapid Development Framework for PHP - Official Repository

issue.body:
Refs #11346

In this Pull Request, Installed the `mcrypt` extension from pecl in the CI so that we can test it.

- added `pear config-set preferred_state snapshot`. Because pecl's mcrypt package is `snapshot`, is not `stable` https://pecl.php.net/package/mcrypt
- I changed `pecl install` to execute first. Because fails `composer require "phpunit/phpunit=$PHPUNIT"`
- remove cannot run test matrix: PHPUnit 3.7 + PHP7.2

body: Based on the comments on https://github.com/symphonycms/symphony-2/issues/2783 it seems we can just get rid of setting `session.save_handler` to `user`. Things work fine without it even on PHP 5.6.

issue.title: Unset the save_handler for PHP7.2

issue.title: Session defaults => 'database' throws exception on PHP 7.2

repository.name: cakephp
repository.description: CakePHP: The Rapid Development Framework for PHP - Official Repository

issue.body:
When configuring session details in config/app.php, using defaults 'database', a runtime exception is being thrown because of incorrect defaults values.

* [x] bug
* [ ] enhancement
* [ ] feature-discussion (RFC)

* CakePHP Version: 3.6.10
* Platform and Target: Apache 2.4.29, PHP 7.2.8

### What you did
A following session, running fine on  PHP 7.0.22, breaks after upgrading to PHP 7.2.8:

```
'Session' => [
        'defaults' => 'database',
        'cookie' => 'cookie',
        'timeout' => 0,
        'cookieTimeout' => 0,
        'autoRegenerate' => true,
        'checkAgent' => false,
        'ini' => [
            'session.cookie_lifetime' => 180
        ]
    ],
```


### What happened
It emits following warning:
```
Warning (4096): ini_set(): Cannot set 'user' save handler by ini_set() or session_module_name()
```
as well as throwing:
```
Error: [RuntimeException] Unable to configure the session, setting session.save_handler failed. #0 /var/www/cake3-app/vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Network/Session.php(214)
```


### What you expected to happen
A session should be configured and running properly.


### How to fix
Removing ```'defaults'  => 'database'``` fixes the issue. The problem lies in file
```vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Network/Session.php:166 ``` These defaults should not set ```'user'``` as session hanlder as it is being checked in ```vendor/cakephp/cakephp/src/Network/Session.php:113 ```
